snippet: The key to the top-ranked Huskies’ success this season will center on Breanna Stewart’s performance and growth as a team leader, attributes she refined during a month abroad with the national team.
abstract: Key to Connecticut women's success this season and possible capture of a third consecutive national title will largely center on Breanna Stewart’s performance and growth as a team leader; she refined those skills under tutelage of WNBA stars, playing with United States women’s national basketball team at the world championship in Turkey.
lead_paragraph: The key to the top-ranked Huskies’ success this season will center on Breanna Stewart’s performance and growth as a team leader, attributes she refined during a month abroad with the national team.

headline.main: Advice and Accolades for UConn’s Breanna Stewart
headline.print_headline: Advice and Accolades for UConn’s Stewart
